PATIENT_ID: TEST_PEN_NECK_002
ARRIVAL_TIME: 2026-02-02 10:00:00

[TRAUMA_HP] 2026-02-02 10:10:00
Category III activation for 52-year-old female. Ground-level fall.
Isolated right wrist deformity. No head or torso involvement.
BP 138/86, HR 72, RR 14, GCS 15.
No external wounds. No lacerations identified.

[IMAGING] 2026-02-02 10:30:00
Right wrist x-ray: distal radius fracture, nondisplaced.
No other injuries identified.

[PHYSICIAN_NOTE] 2026-02-02 10:50:00
Closed reduction and splinting performed. Orthopedic follow-up arranged.
Patient discharged in stable condition.
